name: Magnifying Glass
description:
NOTE: this is not a real “magnifying glass” (i.e. not a real “unblurring glass”), as it appears impossible to create such effect in Figma: for now I cannot see any way to link the decorative part of the lens (glare, shadows) to the subtract from the blur so that the two would move together as a whole. This file contains a workaround that I made.

Let me know if you ever manage to make an unblurring lens the classical way.
